item.title: Can COP30 deliver on climate promises?
item.description: Global attention has currently turned to Belém, one of the gateways to the Brazilian Amazon, where the climate community has gathered for the 30th Conference of the Parties (COP 30) under the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).

item.title: Caring for caregivers: The missing link in disability support
item.description: The most profound acts of love often unfold in homes where a family member lives with a disability. In these homes, a woman—usually the mother, wife, or sister—becomes the entire infrastructure of care; a 24-hour lifeline that holds the household together.
